data.Name: Lil Durk
data.Bio: Durk Derrick Banks (born October 19, 1992), better known as Lil Durk, is a rapper, singer, and songwriter from Chicago, Illinois. Durk is best known for his involvement in the drill wave that took the music world by storm in the 2010s. He is the founder of his own record label, Only the Family (OTF). Durkâ€™s early career was, like many drill artists, plagued with legal issues and accusations of violence. These issues eventually led to his shows being canceled. Read more on Last.fm
